mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Janet Montgomery to Martha Washington, 1800 March 10
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Montgomery, Janet Livingston, 1743-1828
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Condolence letter [on death of Washington] from "a fellow suffer; and a fellow Mourner"--24 years since she lost her husband [Genl. Montgomery, at West Point ?]--her mother sends regards. [See answer, Martha Washington to J. Montgomery, dated April 5, 1800]. Autograph letter signed, 2 pages, laminated with integral address panel and red wax seal.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Washington, George, 1732-1799--Death and burial
